courses.title: Tak-Tok
courses.discription: Developed a MERN stack real-time messaging web application akin to WhatsApp using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, React.js, and Socket.IO.

courses.title: Blogify
courses.discription: Developed a dynamic blog website using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and EJS, with secure user authentication for personalized and scalable performance.

courses.title: Sangit
courses.discription: Created a SangitWeb using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring user-friendly interface, playlist management, and dynamic music streaming capabilities.

courses.title: Portfolio
courses.discription: Created a personal portfolio using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing projects, skills, and experiences with a responsive and interactive design.

courses.title: Pizza-Hub
courses.discription: Developed a pizza delivery website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring interactive menus, online ordering, and a responsive design.
